source:
spark.sql(f"""
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE fo_sanctioneddb.CH_PURCHLINESTAGING
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://{fabric_workspace}@onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/fo_sanctioneddb.Lakehouse/Tables/CH_PURCHLINESTAGING'
AS
SELECT 
    coalesce(T1.TAXITEMGROUP, '') AS TAXITEMGROUP,
    coalesce(T1.TAXGROUP, '') AS TAXGROUP,
    T1.ACCOUNTINGDISTRIBUTIONTEMPLATE AS ACCOUNTINGDISTRIBUTIONTEMPLATE,
    coalesce(T1.ACTIVITYNUMBER, '') AS ACTIVITYNUMBER,
    T1.ADDRESSREFRECID AS ADDRESSREFRECID,
    T1.ADDRESSREFTABLEID AS ADDRESSREFTABLEID,
    T1.AGREEMENTSKIPAUTOLINK AS AGREEMENTSKIPAUTOLINK,
    coalesce(T1.ASSETBOOKID, '') AS ASSETBOOKID,
    coalesce(T1.ASSETGROUP, '') AS ASSETGROUP,
    coalesce(T1.ASSETID, '') AS ASSETID,
    T1.ASSETTRANSTYPEPURCH AS ASSETTRANSTYPEPURCH,
    coalesce(T1.BARCODE, '') AS BARCODE,
    coalesce(T1.BARCODETYPE, '') AS BARCODETYPE,
    T1.BLOCKED AS BLOCKED,
    T1.CFOPTABLE_BR AS CFOPTABLE_BR,
    T1.COMPLETE AS COMPLETE,
    T1.CONFIRMEDDLV AS CONFIRMEDDLV,
    T1.CONFIRMEDTAXAMOUNT AS CONFIRMEDTAXAMOUNT,
    coalesce(T1.CONFIRMEDTAXWRITECODE, '') AS CONFIRMEDTAXWRITECODE,
    coalesce(T1.COUNTYORIGDEST, '') AS COUNTYORIGDEST,
    --,T1.COVREF AS COVREF
    T1.CREATEFIXEDASSET AS CREATEFIXEDASSET,
    T1.CURRENCYCODE AS CURRENCYCODE,
    coalesce(T1.CUSTOMERREF, '') AS CUSTOMERREF,
    coalesce(T1.CUSTPURCHASEORDERFORMNUM, '') AS CUSTPURCHASEORDERFORMNUM,
    T1.DELIVERYDATE AS DELIVERYDATE,
    T1.DELIVERYNAME AS DELIVERYNAME,
    T1.DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS AS DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS,
    T1.DELIVERYTYPE AS DELIVERYTYPE,
    T1.DEPRECIATIONSTARTDATE AS DEPRECIATIONSTARTDATE,
    T1.DISCAMOUNT AS DISCAMOUNT,
    T1.DISCPERCENT AS DISCPERCENT,
    T1.EDITABLEINWORKFLOW AS EDITABLEINWORKFLOW,
    coalesce(T1.EXTERNALITEMID, '') AS EXTERNALITEMID,
    T1.GSTHSTTAXTYPE_CA AS GSTHSTTAXTYPE_CA,
    coalesce(T1.INTERCOMPANYINVENTTRANSID, '') AS INTERCOMPANYINVENTTRANSID,
    T1.INTERCOMPANYORIGIN AS INTERCOMPANYORIGIN,
    T1.INTRASTATFULFILLMENTDATE_HU AS INTRASTATFULFILLMENTDATE_HU,
    T1.INVENTDIMID AS INVENTDIMID,
    T1.INVENTINVOICENOW AS INVENTINVOICENOW,
    T1.INVENTRECEIVEDNOW AS INVENTRECEIVEDNOW,
    coalesce(T1.INVENTREFID, '') AS INVENTREFID,
    coalesce(T1.INVENTREFTRANSID, '') AS INVENTREFTRANSID,
    T1.INVENTTRANSID AS INVENTTRANSID,
    T1.ISDELETED AS ISDELETED,
    T1.ISFINALIZED AS ISFINALIZED,
    T1.ISINVOICEMATCHED AS ISINVOICEMATCHED,
    T1.ISMODIFIED AS ISMODIFIED,
    T1.ISPWP AS ISPWP,
    coalesce(T1.ITEMBOMID, '') AS ITEMBOMID,
    coalesce(T1.ITEMID, '') AS ITEMID,
    T1.ITEMREFTYPE AS ITEMREFTYPE,
    coalesce(T1.ITEMROUTEID, '') AS ITEMROUTEID,
    T1.LINEAMOUNT AS LINEAMOUNT,
    T1.LINEDELIVERYTYPE AS LINEDELIVERYTYPE,
    T1.LINEDISC AS LINEDISC,
    coalesce(T1.LINEHEADER, '') AS LINEHEADER,
    T1.LINENUMBER AS LINENUMBER,
    T1.LINEPERCENT AS LINEPERCENT,
    T1.MANUALENTRYCHANGEPOLICY AS MANUALENTRYCHANGEPOLICY,
    T1.MANUALMODIFIEDFIELD AS MANUALMODIFIEDFIELD,
    T1.MATCHINGAGREEMENTLINE AS MATCHINGAGREEMENTLINE,
    T1.MATCHINGPOLICY AS MATCHINGPOLICY,
    coalesce(T1.MCRDROPSHIPCOMMENT, '') AS MCRDROPSHIPCOMMENT,
    T1.MCRDROPSHIPMENT AS MCRDROPSHIPMENT,
    T1.MCRDROPSHIPSTATUS AS MCRDROPSHIPSTATUS,
    T1.MCRORDERLINE2PRICEHISTORYREF AS MCRORDERLINE2PRICEHISTORYREF,
    T1.MULTILNDISC AS MULTILNDISC,
    T1.MULTILNPERCENT AS MULTILNPERCENT,
    T1.NAME AS NAME,
    T1.OPERATIONTYPE_MX AS OPERATIONTYPE_MX,
    T1.OVERDELIVERYPCT AS OVERDELIVERYPCT,
    coalesce(T1.PDSCALCULATIONID, '') AS PDSCALCULATIONID,
    T1.PDSCWINVENTRECEIVEDNOW AS PDSCWINVENTRECEIVEDNOW,
    T1.PDSCWQTY AS PDSCWQTY,
    T1.PDSCWREMAININVENTFINANCIAL AS PDSCWREMAININVENTFINANCIAL,
    T1.PDSCWREMAININVENTPHYSICAL AS PDSCWREMAININVENTPHYSICAL,
    T1.PLANREFERENCE AS PLANREFERENCE,
    coalesce(T1.PORT, '') AS PORT,
    T1.PRICEUNIT AS PRICEUNIT,
    T1.PROCUREMENTCATEGORY AS PROCUREMENTCATEGORY,
    T1.PROJCATEGORYID AS PROJCATEGORYID,
    T1.PROJID AS PROJID,
    T1.PROJLINEPROPERTYID AS PROJLINEPROPERTYID,
    T1.PROJSALESCURRENCYID AS PROJSALESCURRENCYID,
    T1.PROJSALESPRICE AS PROJSALESPRICE,
    T1.PROJSALESUNITID AS PROJSALESUNITID,
    coalesce(T1.PROJTAXGROUPID, '') AS PROJTAXGROUPID,
    coalesce(T1.PROJTAXITEMGROUPID, '') AS PROJTAXITEMGROUPID,
    T1.PROJTRANSID AS PROJTRANSID,
    T1.PROJWORKER AS PROJWORKER,
    coalesce(T1.PSARETAINSCHEDULEID, '') AS PSARETAINSCHEDULEID,
    T1.PSATOTALRETAINAMOUNT AS PSATOTALRETAINAMOUNT,
    T1.PURCHASETYPE AS PURCHASETYPE,
    T1.PURCHCOMMITMENTLINE_PSN AS PURCHCOMMITMENTLINE_PSN,
    T1.PURCHID AS PURCHID,
    T1.PURCHMARKUP AS PURCHMARKUP,
    T1.PURCHPRICE AS PURCHPRICE,
    T1.PURCHQTY AS PURCHQTY,
    T1.PURCHRECEIVEDNOW AS PURCHRECEIVEDNOW,
    coalesce(T1.PURCHREQID, '') AS PURCHREQID,
    T1.PURCHREQLINEREFID AS PURCHREQLINEREFID,
    T1.PURCHSTATUS AS PURCHSTATUS,
    T1.PURCHUNIT AS PURCHUNIT,
    T1.QTYORDERED AS QTYORDERED,
    T1.RBOPACKAGELINENUM AS RBOPACKAGELINENUM,
    T1.REMAINDER AS REMAINDER,
    T1.REMAININVENTFINANCIAL AS REMAININVENTFINANCIAL,
    T1.REMAININVENTPHYSICAL AS REMAININVENTPHYSICAL,
    T1.REMAINPURCHFINANCIAL AS REMAINPURCHFINANCIAL,
    T1.REMAINPURCHPHYSICAL AS REMAINPURCHPHYSICAL,
    coalesce(T1.REQATTENTION, '') AS REQATTENTION,
    coalesce(T1.REQPLANIDSCHED, '') AS REQPLANIDSCHED,
    coalesce(T1.REQPOID, '') AS REQPOID,
    T1.REQUESTER AS REQUESTER,
    T1.RETAILLINENUMEX1 AS RETAILLINENUMEX1,
    coalesce(T1.RETAILPACKAGEID, '') AS RETAILPACKAGEID,
    T1.RETAILTEMPVALUEEX2 AS RETAILTEMPVALUEEX2,
    coalesce(T1.RETURNACTIONID, '') AS RETURNACTIONID,
    coalesce(T1.RETURNDISPOSITIONCODEID, '') AS RETURNDISPOSITIONCODEID,
    T1.RETURNSTATUS AS RETURNSTATUS,
    T1.SCRAP AS SCRAP,
    coalesce(T1.SERVICEADDRESS, '') AS SERVICEADDRESS,
    T1.SERVICEDATE AS SERVICEDATE,
    T1.SHIPPINGDATECONFIRMED AS SHIPPINGDATECONFIRMED,
    T1.SHIPPINGDATEREQUESTED AS SHIPPINGDATEREQUESTED,
    T1.SKIPDISTRIBUTIONUPDATE AS SKIPDISTRIBUTIONUPDATE,
    T1.SOURCEDOCUMENTLINE AS SOURCEDOCUMENTLINE,
    T1.STATISTICVALUE_LT AS STATISTICVALUE_LT,
    coalesce(T1.STATPROCID, '') AS STATPROCID,
    T1.STATTRIANGULARDEAL AS STATTRIANGULARDEAL,
    T1.STOCKEDPRODUCT AS STOCKEDPRODUCT,
    T1.SYSTEMENTRYCHANGEPOLICY AS SYSTEMENTRYCHANGEPOLICY,
    T1.SYSTEMENTRYSOURCE AS SYSTEMENTRYSOURCE,
    coalesce(T1.TAMITEMVENDREBATEGROUPID, '') AS TAMITEMVENDREBATEGROUPID,
    T1.TAX1099AMOUNT AS TAX1099AMOUNT,
    T1.TAX1099FIELDS AS TAX1099FIELDS,
    T1.TAX1099RECID AS TAX1099RECID,
    coalesce(T1.TAX1099STATE, '') AS TAX1099STATE,
    T1.TAX1099STATEAMOUNT AS TAX1099STATEAMOUNT,
    T1.TAXAUTOGENERATED AS TAXAUTOGENERATED,
    coalesce(T1.TAXSERVICECODE_BR, '') AS TAXSERVICECODE_BR,
    coalesce(T1.TAXWITHHOLDBASECUR_TH, '') AS TAXWITHHOLDBASECUR_TH,
    coalesce(T1.TAXWITHHOLDGROUP_TH, '') AS TAXWITHHOLDGROUP_TH,
    T1.TAXWITHHOLDITEMGROUPHEADING_TH AS TAXWITHHOLDITEMGROUPHEADING_TH,
    coalesce(T1.TRANSACTIONCODE, '') AS TRANSACTIONCODE,
    coalesce(T1.TRANSPORT, '') AS TRANSPORT,
    T1.UNDERDELIVERYPCT AS UNDERDELIVERYPCT,
    coalesce(T1.VARIANTID, '') AS VARIANTID,
    T1.VENDACCOUNT AS VENDACCOUNT,
    T1.VENDGROUP AS VENDGROUP,
    T1.WFDELIVERYDUESTATE AS WFDELIVERYDUESTATE,
    T1.WFINVRECEIVEDSTATE AS WFINVRECEIVEDSTATE,
    T1.WORKFLOWSTATE AS WORKFLOWSTATE,
    T1.CREDITEDVENDINVOICETRANS AS CREDITEDVENDINVOICETRANS,
    T1.INTRASTATCOMMODITY AS INTRASTATCOMMODITY,
    coalesce(T1.ORIGCOUNTRYREGIONID, '') AS ORIGCOUNTRYREGIONID,
    coalesce(T1.ORIGSTATEID, '') AS ORIGSTATEID,
    T1.PURCHASEORDERLINECREATIONMETHOD AS PURCHASEORDERLINECREATIONMETHOD,
    T1.CHAUTHORIZEDGEOGRAPHICCODESSETUP AS CHAUTHORIZEDGEOGRAPHICCODESSETUP,
    T1.CHEMPLOYEERECEIVINGBENEFIT AS CHEMPLOYEERECEIVINGBENEFIT,
    coalesce(T1.CHMACTIVITYNUMBER, '') AS CHMACTIVITYNUMBER,
    coalesce(T1.CHMPROJECTID, '') AS CHMPROJECTID,
    coalesce(T1.CHMPROJECTLEGALENTITY, '') AS CHMPROJECTLEGALENTITY,
    T1.CHSOURCEFUNDINGSETUP AS CHSOURCEFUNDINGSETUP,
    coalesce(T1.CHUDFCODE, '') AS CHUDFCODE,
    T1.PARTITION AS CHPARTITION,
    T1.RECID AS CHRECID,
    T1.RECVERSION AS CHRECVERSION,
    T1.CREATEDDATETIME AS CHCREATEDDATETIME,
    T1.MODIFIEDDATETIME AS CHMODIFIEDDATETIME,
    T1.DATAAREAID AS CHDATAAREAID,
    T1.LINEAMOUNT AS CONTRACTVALUE,
    T1.MODIFIEDDATETIME AS MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    T1.CREATEDDATETIME AS CREATEDDATETIME,
    T1.RECVERSION AS RECVERSION,
    T1.DATAAREAID AS DATAAREAID,
    T1.PARTITION AS PARTITION,
    T1.RECID AS RECID,
    CAST(T1.DefaultDimension AS BIGINT) AS DEFAULTDIMENSION,
    CAST(T1.LedgerDimension AS BIGINT) AS LEDGERDIMENSION,
    CAST(CONCAT(CAST(T1.PARTITION AS STRING), '|', coalesce(T1.DATAAREAID, ''), '|', coalesce(T1.PROJID, '')) AS STRING) AS FKPROJECT,
    CAST(CONCAT(CAST(T1.PARTITION AS STRING), '|', T1.DATAAREAID, '|', coalesce(T1.ACTIVITYNUMBER, '')) AS STRING) AS FKACTIVITY,
    CAST(CONCAT(CAST(T1.PARTITION AS STRING), '|', T1.DATAAREAID, '|', coalesce(T1.VENDACCOUNT, '')) AS STRING) AS FKVENDOR,
    CAST(T1.RECID AS BIGINT) AS PKRECID,
    CAST(CONCAT(T1.DATAAREAID, '|', T1.PURCHID) AS STRING) AS FKVENDORPO,
    CAST(NULL AS BIGINT) AS BUDGETRESERVATIONLINE_PSN
FROM fo_query.PurchLine T1
WHERE T1.isActive = 1
""")
